effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 995,627 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 529,311.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,145, up to 10,728.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.5 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
